jobInfo.postDescription:
Job Responsibilities: 
•	Responsible for system verification and validation execution activity for CT product program according to QMS – design control process.
•	Responsible for system Verification and Validation DHF (Design History Files), includes design verification plan, test procedures, test results and summary report.
•	Responsible for identify system defects and potential issues, submitting and verifying defects as required.
•	Need to understand all aspects of the design (electrical, electronics, mechanical, SW…) to making system V&V effective and productivity. 
•	Support to design, optimize and maintain correlative system V&V documents, equipments, tools, servers and JIG.

Educational Profile: 
B.S. or above in related field (Computer Science, electrical, electronics, instruments, medical imaging, etc.)

Experience Profile: 
•	Product knowledge: Above 2 years experience in product development and test, preferably in large and complex products, know industry background knowledge of corresponding product, understand large and complex products testing structure and process.
•	Test knowledge: Rich test experience, deep understanding for test theory, technology, skill, tools and process, very good sense of testing work.
•	Familiar with defect tracking system and automation test system.
•	Hospital medical imaging device operation experience is preferred.
jobInfo.address: 北京大兴区GEHC新大楼同济南路1号北京通用电气

brandComInfo.introduce:
公司网址：http://www.huaxsoft.com

公司简介
       华信永益创建于享有中国硅谷美誉的北京中关村， 总部设在北京，同时在上海、南京、杭州和成都设有分公司和办事处，公司凝聚了拥有理想与智慧的IT行业精英人才，专门从事应用软件开发、软件外包、信息系统集成、医疗咨询及解决方案、互联网技术与应用开发的高科技企业。
         我们致力于为各行业客户提供完美的解决方案，共同打造一家“懂得需求落地、力求完美体验”的公司。我们致力于追求客户利益最大化、追求优质满意的服务、追求可持续发展的战略方针、追求以人为本的生存之道，致力于为我们的客户提供完美的解决方案和一流的IT服务。
        华信永益公司高管团队来联想集团、中软集团和东软集团高级管理职位，拥有丰富的经营和管理经验，技术负责人曾任亚信、用友等公司的CTO，是美国PMI协会PMP会员、高级信息项目管理师，中国系统与软件过程改进协会主任专家会员，拥有着丰富的技术和项目管理经验。


公司愿景与价值观

愿景：成为一家国内公认的IT服务行业领导公司，为客户提供高价值的创新性和可持续性服务。
核心价值观：责任与持续创新。对社会、客户、伙伴、员工、投资人和员工负责，这也是华信永益存在的理由；持续创新就是勤于总结，善于学习，主动应对变化, 永远追求卓越，这是华信永益不断前进的动力。
